title: Daily Wire Backstage: Memorial Day Edition
description:
Did Memorial Day just happen to unofficially mark the moment Americans decided the lockdowns were over? Is Trump really trying to get Joe Scarborough investigated for murder? Has Joe Biden been granted the power to determine who is and isn't black in this country?

Join this roundtable discussion featuring Ben Shapiro, Andrew Klavan, Michael Knowles, Daily Wire god-king Jeremy Boreing and special guests Jocko Willink and Gary Sinse as they get to the bottom of these questions and more.

LIMITED TIME OFFER: Become a Daily Wire All-Access member for 15% OFF with coupon code: DWACCESS and get a SECOND LEFTIST TEARS Tumbler: https://utm.io/uyZc

For more Gary Sinise:
Check out the difference being made by Gary's COVID-19 initiative here:
https://www.garysinisefoundation.org/emergency-covid-19-combat-service/

Watch the full National Memorial Day concert hosted by Gary here: https://www.pbs.org/national-memorial-day-concert/

For more Jocko Willink:
Podcast: https://jockopodcast.com
Book: "Leadership Strategy and Tactics" https://amzn.to/3gsUUsr
Be sure to check out the video of Jocko's moving poem, "The Fallen Soldier": https://youtu.be/SBnyEupyNB8
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
